A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great visuals but that's it basicaly. Too many unanswered questions\, too much stupid behavior and I realy hate what they did with the \"classic\" characters. On top of that\, the tone feels a bit strange from time to time and a lot of it was recycled from old (and better) Star Wars movies.\nIf you love great VFX\, this is your movie. If you love a god Star Wars story\, skip this one.
